title: Institutional Resistance Within Government Agencies
description: Track instances of government employees and agencies resisting authoritarian directives, including whistleblowing, policy resistance, and bureaucratic slowdowns.
research_areas: What are the specific dates and actors involved in Institutional Resistance Within Government Agencies?
What are the financial amounts and policy changes related to this investigation?
How does this connect to broader institutional capture patterns?
What documentation and sources verify these timeline events?
source_requirements: Government documents, financial records, policy communications
